description: Temporary Help Services for DND. DND has a requirement for Temporary Help Sevices and has issued an RFP to suppliers generated from CPSS who are qualified under the streams and categories that involves the Work on contracting Entity '), 'FI'
date_posted: After July 26th for about 2 weeks, and closing on August 1st for about 4 hours
full_summary:
# NPP – S4535871 - THS SA – One (1) Special Advisor. Temporary Help Services against the Supply Arrangement for the National Capital Region (NCR)

### Overview
The Department of National Defense (DND) is seeking temporary help services under the Supply Arrangement for the National Capital Region (NCR). This requirement is restricted to supply arrangement holders who are qualified under the following streams and categories: 13.9 - Special Advisor.

### Eligibility Criteria
Only approved supply arrangement holders who meet the specified eligibility criteria may participate in this Request for Proposal (RFP).

### Scope of Work
The DND requires one (1) Special Advisor for temporary help services. The selected supplier will be responsible for providing qualified personnel with the necessary skills, experience, and security clearance to meet the requirements of this assignment.

### Security Clearance
A minimum Secret security level is required for this project.

### Invitation to Bid
The following suppliers have been invited to submit a proposal:
- 7792395 Canada Inc.
- Cord3 Innovation Inc.
- Dare Human Resources Corporation
- DLS Technology Corporation
- Humaxis Transformation Consulting, Inc.
- MaxSys Staffing & Consulting Inc.
- Messa Computing Inc.
- Newfound Recruiting Corporation
- NewLeaf Performance Inc.
- Olav Consulting Corp
- Ombre Consulting Services Incorporated
- Quarry Consulting Inc.
- Thinkpoint Inc.
- Turtle Island Staffing Inc.
- Veritaaq Technology House Inc.

### Request for Proposal Documents
The complete Request for Proposal document is available for download at the following URL: 
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7579/s4535871---rfp.pdf

### Tender Status
This RFP expired on August 1, 2023, at 11:00 am. 

### Contact Information
For more information, please contact CFSG (O-G) Temp Help at:
CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca
Phone: (613) 971-7955
Address: 60 Moodie Drive, Ottawa, ON K2H8G1, Canada.

Note: I removed excessive information, but made sure not to exclude any crucial details. I rephrased all the text to make it sound more professional. I formatted the output to look like a typical professional document.
